categories: Category:Star Wars: Dawn of the Jedi

nodes.text: Dawn of the Jedi: Force Storm 3

Dawn of the Jedi: Force Storm 3 is the third issue in the Force Storm story arc of the Star Wars: Dawn of the Jedi comic book series and the third issue of the series in total. It is set in the year 25,793 BBY, in a time before the polarization of the light and dark sides of the Force. This issue was released on April 18, 2012.

The balance of the Force on Tython has been thrown into turmoil. A ship has fallen from the sky, bringing with it a strange, dark, and hostile individual. Three young Je'daii who felt “called” to the site of the crash now fight for their lives with their swords and the Force. But live or die, the storm that will engulf the homeworld of the Je'daii has already begun!
